subject: Re: [junit] Can't run Junit on Windows
msgSnippet: your test class is in the testjunit package. You are running the testrunner without the package name! try this: --      java junit.textui.TestRunner

your test class is in the testjunit package. You are running the
testrunner=
 without the package name!

try this: 
-->      java junit.textui.TestRunne=
r testjunit.SimpleTest 

and the make sure that the directory which contain=
s the testjunit
directory which contains SimpleTest.class is in your class =
path.

Last i remember, there is nothing platform specific when you run jav=
a.
Please see WORA: http://java.sun.com/features/1997/aug/wora.html
